mapper.insert: insert into user(user_id, user_pass, user_name , user_email, user_tel, zip_code, address1, address2, address3, address4) values(#{user_id}, #{user_pass}, #{user_name} , #{user_email}, #{user_tel}, #{zip_code}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{address3}, #{address4})
mapper.select: select * from user where user_id = #{user_id} and user_pass = #{user_pass}
select user_id from user where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET user_id = #{user_id},user_pass=#{user_pass}, user_name=#{user_name},user_email=#{user_email}, user_tel=#{user_tel},zip_code=#{zip_code}, address1=#{address1},address2=#{address2}, address3=#{address3},address4=#{address4}, user_point=#{user_point} WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
